City Council

Meetings

The following calendars include regular City Council meetings only.

2025 Council Calendar
2026 Council Calendar

*Special City Council meetings will be called on an as needed basis and are not reflected on the annual Council Calendar.

For more information about meeting time and location view posted agendas.

  • Request a Proclamation

To Contact Council (email all members). Request an appearance by Mayor or City Council.

Agendas, Minutes & Videos

To view the current council agenda -> Public Notices. Archived Agendas & Minutes. Access the live video stream during a regularly scheduled meeting or view archived videos of previous meetings.

Form of Government

The City of Burleson operates under a council-city manager form of government. Citizens are represented on the City Council by the mayor and 6 council members, all elected at large to serve 3-year terms.

Meet Your Elected Officials

  • Chris Fletcher, Mayor
  • Victoria Johnson, Council Place 1
  • Phil Anderson, Council Place 2
  • Alexa Boedeker, Council Place 3
  • Larry Scott, Council Place 4
  • Dan McClendon, Council Place 5 & Mayor Pro Tem
  • Adam Russell, Council Place 6
